name: cheeks_jd
text: oh man the last panel just makes it for me

name: skellingtonloc
text: Yeah, it looks like Beef is concerned that Ray is ruining the message with his tomfoolery.

name: boswelljn
text: yeah, but two martinis while on rollerblades? Makes a handicapped man feel something special.

name: tourach3
text: hell of aggro skating there, mister ray

name: dovey
text: The dude has icky moves.

name: featurelessvoid
text: Ray is even willing to risk joining the ranks of the handicapped by drinking two martinis while on rollerblades. The man has commitment .

name: spinynorman
text: Ray certainly is both flexible and athletic for a dude with diabetes and a gut that almost functions as a skirt.

name: spinynorman
text: Also, check out beef just quietly pointing at the ramp. He's like the world's worst Vanna White.

name: blarghamagarky
text: wow I almost never noticed him in that panel. So much better

name: apocowarg
text: I like how Ray is jumping the computer from the opposite side of the ramp, as if using the ramp would be below him.

name: spinynorman
text: Actually, there does seem to be something behind the computers, so maybe he set up a ramp at the last minute?

name: apocowarg
text: I think you're on to something there. Nice spot.

name: neaner
text: I really love the second panel. The composition of the frame is amazing, and Ray always manages to keep his drink in tact! Tha dogg's got skillz.

name: tripleg
text: it is good to have drinks that speak diplomatically

name: unakau
text: Something about this one is very Bloom County.  I could picture Milo in place of Ray and Binkley in place of Beef.

name: klaus
text: They are so excited.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: It probably says bad things about me that this strip probably made me laugh the hardest of any of them. Probably.

name: dotacreepy
text: A comment left by dotacreepy was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Norsef, riotdejaneiro, chivalress, Talbain)

name: heccibiggs
text: I read this "word" out loud several times, and I have absolutely no idea what the hell you're trying to convey.

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
As did I, all rolling the two Rs and everything. I... is this even in a language?

The fact that it's followed by a winking smiley face makes it kind of disturbing to me, too. Like it's a suggestion that I do lewd acts on the internet.

Oh god time to go away now.

name: semiquaver
text: llamcranxplo XD

name: farvana
text:
It is like Czech. Czech is what happens when the alphabet decides enough is enough and says "Screw you, man! FUCK you!"

Was this worth posting six months after the fact? Pravd%u011Bpodobn%u011B.

name: cagliostro
text: Shit, that really is a pretty weird language.

name: jonmw
text: I bet that it's "probably".

name: splendorr
text: mauitbyea ;)

name: susurrus
text:
as a handicapped man myself, this strip also made me laugh.

on an unrelated note, his "braille" font looks more like morse code.

name: soticoto
text:
That'd be because it is.
Though given that there are only 11 letters there, I doubt you're dealing with an actual translation in any sense of the word.

name: overmedicated
text: A comment left by overmedicated was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, tttt2, ohmygooses, the_dingle)

name: prius_chaser
text: I think that's Morse Code.

name: overmedicated
text: Damn, I supose that makes me even more retarded.

name: splendorr
text:
Welcome. We have ramps.

RAAAAMPS.

name: rayj3rd
text: It's like we care or something!

name: djwhiterabbit
text:
unfortunately the morse code "-.. -.- .. - - ... --- .-.. - -.- -.- .. ..." translates to nothing more than "DKITTSOLTKKIS" (cross-checked from two different sites).

thanks to http://www.onlineconversion.com/morse_code.htm

name: dotacreepy
text: A comment left by dotacreepy was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ButterMoths, sharksarecoming, wittyname, fosters, erributtz, Vweep, zaratustra, Endquote, JonMW, nutmeg, cailetshadow, nathanielperson, Mastronaut)

name: direhaggis
text: Yet that along with the meaningless semaphore is one of the best parts. I think Onstad meant it to be an ironic joke. It makes the whole handicap-accessible theme all the more fantastic.

name: lizard
text: I was hoping it would tranlate to "prribaalkeuy"

name: splendorr
text: ddidenaaiahftu, dhyit? ;)

name: gusplease
text: If Ambrose Bierce ever stumbles out of a Mexican time-rift and learns Internet, I wager that this will be his favorite Achewood.

name: saru
text: I love the unspoken assumption that Ambrose Bierce would automatically discover Achewood were he exposed to the Internet.

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by TonyHighwind, Vweep, Thirteen20WRX, yingkaixing)

name: tatterdemalion
text: Achewood would draw Ambrose Beirce, as a Romantic to opium or self-pity.  *firm nod*

name: mrobin604
text: A comment left by mrobin604 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by kylank, fell, Lacrimus, scion, luasn, larkin, tehloki, Nictusempra)

name: stuart
text: since assetbar discards plusses i guess you should have written more As huh

name: jonmw
text:
AAAAAAAAAAAA!
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!
AAAAAAAAAAA!
AAAAAAAAAAA!
AAAAAAAAAAA!

where's that danged guy with the screaming-phillipe avatar when you need him

name: emmdee
text: Man I love that second panel so hard . if i'm ever in a wheelchair i want it tattooed on my face, or engraved on my grave stone.

name: scramblesthedog
text: A comment left by scramblesthedog was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by wharfrat, straw, divot, kylank)

name: ralgnar
text: No, the blind people's jokes are invisible. The morse code is for recovering ham radio operators. And the semaphore is for, I dunno, pirates maybe.

name: greenkoolayd
text: semaphore is for coast guard retirees

name: mr_pete
text: ADA Compliance Certificate on File With Property Manager

name: sabalpalm
text: This is probably my favorite strip.

name: flynn
text: If that strip had four more panels, Ray would have managed three martinis at once.

name: mrcool1122
text: Does that wheelchair have a ball and chain attached to it?

name: mrcool1122
text: Oh, wait, I get it now. Symbolism .

name: unityrolf
text: Hey are you from Owatonna?  Love the avatar.

name: yomimono
text: Man, you and I have both been like, "I recognize that building," but we meant two completely different buildings because it's so damn blurry.  DAMN IT MRCOOL1122 I DEMAND SATISFACTION

name: judahnielsen
text: The morse code is nonsense and the Semaphore is the letter K... sort of.

name: closefriend
text: To be fair, the easiest way to do any sort of signing or braille or Morse code or what have you is to just make shit up. If I was deaf and someone was signing the president's speech I'd be all, "Fuck the budget and the economy, Mr. President, I'm DEAF!"

name: tellumo
text: I'm listening to the radio

name: jack
text: I think it's more the letter "O" http://www.winterbourne.freeuk.com/semaphore.gif

name: catachresis
text: Second panel and last panel are so awesome my eyes caught fire

name: epicurus
text: This is a type of silly strip that just bursts with fun energy and nonchalance and it is very awesome.

name: rolotonybrowntown
text: i agree that this may be the funniest single strip ever. Ray in panel 4 is tattoo worthy

name: tinhand
text: Roast Beef points to the ramp in panel 3.

name: becivilmarlowe
text: This was the first strip I ever viewed which was a very strange introduction to the world of Achewood. Since then it's become the strip that pops into my head the most often. Especially panel 2. Also I love at the end how they (or just Ray) moved in another ramp to the right which is even more superfluous than the first one.

name: shoinan
text: This strip would definitely be a strange introduction, but I'm not suprised that you got through a strange first impression to find genius by your brilliant Arrested Development avatar. A chubby to you sir, for being a fan of two of the greatest things ever.

name: gumfish
text: I have the second panel cropped and ready for internet use. I try to post it whenever I can.

name: gumfish
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: buttermoths
text: I want this as a t-shirt. So bad. DAAAMN.

name: phthoggos
text: now THIS is some icon/post synergy.

name: scion
text: Reminds me of a motorcycle flying over a mountain.

name: jonmw
text:
At first, I scrolled past too quickly and it looked like mario was jumping over the wheelchair.
And then I noticed that Ray is doing something kinda similar, leading way out with one foot.

name: pitseleh
text:
DAAAAAAAMN! Ray just jumped that computer with two, count 'em TWO, martinis in hand!

Ray is one rude dude!

name: wharfrat
text: This is honestly pretty much my favorate strip he has ever written, it completely embodies achewood style chaos and confusion

name: art-vader
text: Is your avatar the helix Nebula known as the eye of god?

name: centipede_damascus
text: In this strip, Ray skates the dreams of the children who have no one to speak for them.

name: norrin
text: I was thrown off by Ray dropping the N bomb on panel one. Then all I could think was "Wait...is Ray black?"

name: bovine
text: he's a CAT.

name: saru
text:
Hmm. I was about to write about how cats still haven't experienced a history of slavery, degradation, segregation and discrimination, so it's still not Kosher.
But then I thought of this Tim Kreider strip, and this picture , and thought, when was the last time you saw a cat drinking from the same water fountain as a white person?

name: heccibiggs
text: Holy shit. That person put a cat in a cat costume.

name: drskradley
text:
Yes! YES!!!

After hours of scouring, I finally found this strip! I feel like I've accomplished something today! Hooray and huzzah!

name: drskradley
text: Fuck, FUCK that was gold.  It was worth searching for.

name: woodenteeth
text: These two comments somehow feel like your brain is hooked up to the internet... that your posts are involuntary sometimes.

name: art-vader
text: I read it as "after hours of showering", which goes well with your avatar.

name: endoftheworld
text: I confess to using "It's like I care or something!" in personal and business email.

name: dropkickpikachu
text:
This is the only strip in all of Achewood where a character uses the word "nigga."

It's used extremely well.

name: geysershitdick
text:
ACHEWORLD SCAVENGER HUNT!

Find the other strip that uses a "nigger" variant. You're not allowed to use the search function.

name: baryonyx
text: I [url=http://m.assetbar.com/achewood/uua8q7vK0]founds[/u] it! I AM THE WINNER.

name: baryonyx
text:
And now, I am disqualified for bungling BBcode!

But seriously guys.

name: saddestking
text:
In addition, in the following two links, a Klansman uses it in relation to an entertainer, and Philippe blogs about using the word.

http://m.assetbar.com/achewood/uua7TZl1X
http://philippesblog.blogspot.com/2008/01/i-said-hate-word-oh-my-gosh-it-is-so.html

name: bpmead
text:
I'm going to go out on a limb here and say that this also counts:
http://m.assetbar.com/achewood/uuag1KXjJ

name: dwodles
text: Two martinis, a pair of rollerblades, and a snazzy tux.  Ray lives the good life.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Roast Beef: Might get on down to Nicaragua.
Onstad: Whoops! "Facto."

name: stewieisgod13
text: I would like a recipe for opening a can of cherries.

name: tekende
text: It will be in Parade Magazine this weekend.

name: achilleselbow
text:
Smuckles Delight (serves one):

Ingredients:
1 can of cherries
1 pair of hands
1 can opener

Steps:

1. Open can.

name: bixschmix
text: 3. Profit!

name: fineoakstructure
text: For the love of god WHAT IS STEP 2???? I must know

name: capnroblivious
text: You already said it.  Step 2: ????

name: fineoakstructure
text:
I did not know at the time of my post above that this whole thing was a South Park reference and is still a "meme".

I know this now.

name: splendorr
text: I would never have applied a chubby to the comment above, had I ever scrolled down far enough to know that I was rewarding memery.

name: bixschmix
text: I didn't actually know it was from South Park. In my life, it's just a thing people say sometimes.

name: airshipp
text: they do have braille fonts. Instead of converting the information to text it converts it to data readable by an actuator positioned on a wheel. By turning the wheel past the actuator, various bumps on the wheel's surfaced are raised to form the braille letter. Simply by placing one's fingers on this wheel and turning it a website can be read. Wow.

name: pogo
text: The ramp, of course, is totally useless, since the computer could acutally stay on the friggin' floor!

name: theguitarhero
text: That's the joke, I think.

name: pogo
text: There's a tradition here on Assetbar of stating the obvious.  So next time, save the "I think."

name: theguitarhero
text:
That's the joke.

I just love how the motion lines imply he made the jump from BEHIND the computer, an unassisted jump.

name: kharitonov
text: My favorite thing about the ramp is that there's no space between the ramp edge and the computer for the wheelchair to go, so the poor handicapped guy would just roll right back down again.

name: eatmorekix
text: in this strip, Ray does several things handicapped people can not do.

name: zapatos
text: hell yes.

name: puguglypress
text: like having fun

name: bex
text: Rollerblades, but no deadly mishap. Odd.

name: krispykorn
text: In my humble opinion, this is the best Achewood strip. It doesn't get better than this. It doesn't .

name: fatbatmat
text: I love ham

name: singtralala
text: dang what is going on?

name: telescreen
text: I found no invisible jokes.

name: varnish
text: In this strip, I imagine the soundtrack played to be that of an early keyboard's demo. The sound played at the second panel is what the keyboard calls "high hat", even though it in actuality bears no resemblance to that.

name: dasilodavi
text: That last panel is the deaf man's version of "Hey!  Our jive-asshole cartoonist couldn't think of an ending to this pointless strip!  Looks like it's time to hit the road."

name: spicyponyhead
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: karljw
text: this is top 10 achewood. my feelings on this strip are pro.

name: jergason
text: The fact that there are rollerblades in this comic concerns me. Is someone going to die? Onward through the archive I go.
